        public Camera createCamera(String name)

        Creates a Camera associated with the given name.

        Parameters:
        name - name.
        Returns:
        Camera.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if name is already in use.
        NullPointerException - if name is null.

      • destroyCamera

        public boolean destroyCamera(String name)

        Destroys the Camera of the given name.

        Parameters:
        name - camera name.
        Returns:
        false if no camera has the name.

      • getCamera

        public Camera getCamera(String name)

        Gets the Camera with the given name.

        Parameters:
        name - name.
        Returns:
        camera, or null if no camera is associated with the name.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if name is null.
